Text: Taku Jihofa ka ñw Aro̩n kakini, Uwe̩ kpai amo̩ma-we̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpai abo unyi ata-we̩ manyʼuwe̩ ane̩ udu uña kiafo̩-i; oñ uwe̩ kpai amo̩ma-we̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ manyʼuwe̩ ane̩ udu uko̩lo̩ atama ku me̩ de.

E̩ ño̩ kʼamo̩maye-we̩, abo o̩lo̩pu Lifai, owñ chʼo̩lo̩pu ata-we̩ le̩ wa manyʼuwe̩, kʼama ki dama kpai uwe̩, ku ma che e̩wñ ñw e̩; uwe̩ kpai amo̩ma-we̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpai uwe̩ muda ajo̩ o̩gba unyabo ibenu-i ache e̩wñ.
Ama le̩ anʼide kʼuwe̩ adu ñwu ma ade, kpai ide e̩wñ unyabo le̩ chaka; ma muda ate̩me̩rʼe̩wñ eku uña kiafo̩ kpai ugbo ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩ n, kʼama ki we eku, tʼame̩, tʼama.
Ma la adama kpai uwe̩, ku ma la fʼide unyabo ujeju de, todu uko̩lo̩ unyabo le̩ chaka; e̩ne̩ ejaduña du la ate̩me̩ru me̩ n.
Oñ ame̩ anʼide uña kiafo̩ ade, kpai ide ubo̩ iche̩bo̩-wñ; kʼuwe̩do̩ ki ño̩ dabi bʼabo Israe̩l ma ge̩ n.
I la chʼe-mi, go, u mʼamo̩maye-me̩, abo Lifai le̩, ko kwef abo Israe̩l; u mʼuma ko chʼame̩ ele todu Jihofa ku ma ki che uko̩lo̩ unyabo ujeju le̩.

Tak uwe̩ kpai amo̩ma-we̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ manyʼuwe̩ ade uko̩lo̩ atama-me̩ le̩ ugbo e̩wñ ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ chaka, kpai uko̩lo̩ e̩wñ du ki jʼejefu ukpo ugbeju le̩; ame̩ achʼuko̩lo̩ e-le̩. U mʼo̩da uko̩lo̩ atama-me̩ le̩ du chʼame̩ ele. E̩ne̩ ejaduña du kʼi la te̩me̩rʼu, ekpa ma akpa.

Taku Jihofa ka ñw Aro̩n kakini, Go, omi la mʼide e̩wñ iche̩bo̩-mi ku ma ko nyʼate̩ le̩ du ñw e̩ kʼe̩ de, owñ chʼe̩wñ abo Israe̩l du kiafo̩; uwe̩ omi ko ñw u todu ekpo ku ma ba tʼe̩ oji, kpai amo̩ma-we̩, kʼi chʼukpe̩-me̩ o̩gbegbele̩.

E̩wñ ki la achʼe-we̩ kwef e̩wñ kiafo̩ e-efo̩ ku ma ma ko nyʼuna n le̩ de̩; e̩wñ O̩jo̩-ma du, kpai e̩wñ ele-ma du, kpai e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ adure-ma, kpai e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ abi-ma ku ma je̩ chaka, e-ku ma akowa ñwu mi achʼe-kiafo̩ e-efo̩ todu we̩ kpai todu amo̩ma-we̩.
Alu kʼe̩ je̩ e̩wñ kiafo̩ e-efo̩ le̩ abe̩le̩ ame̩ aje̩; e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ du aje̩; e̩wñ kiafo̩ ñw e̩ i che.

E̩wñ ki lañʼachʼe-we̩ de̩ ge̩, e̩wñ ku ma ko nyʼate̩ kwef e̩wñ ele-ma, manyʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ du kʼabo Israe̩l ko wa amiejo; e-le̩ omi muko ñw e̩ kpai amo̩ma-we̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpai amo̩ma-we̩ onobule̩ manyʼuwe̩, e-le̩ achʼuhio̩me̩ o̩gbegbele̩: e̩ne̩ du kʼi dʼef unyi-we̩ kʼo̩la-wñ fe̩ neke aje̩.
Ekpo e-ki nyo̩ tule chaka kpai e-ki nyo̩ tule ef omi achiwebe̩te̩ma etito̩ kpai e̩wñ e̩yo̩, chaka, owñ chʼejo̩ga e̩wñ ku ma kowa ñwu Jihofa le̩, uwe̩ u ko ñwu.
Ero e̩wñ du ki dʼoj ane̩-ma e-kʼi abie̩ ejodudu, e-ku ma ko wʼugbo Jihofa le̩, uwe̩ ane̩; e̩ne̩ du kʼi dʼef unyi-we̩ kʼo̩la-wñ fe̩ neke aje̩.
E̩wñ du kʼi dʼef abo Israe̩l ku ma dute̩ ñw O̩jo̩ uwe̩ ane̩.

E̩wñ o̩re̩la du kʼi akpʼo̩gba iye-wñ na, ef e̩la ku ma du wa ñwu Jihofa, dagba i chʼone̩ dagba i chʼe̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩, uwe̩ ane̩; e̩ muda ala o̩mo̩gba e-one̩ tane̩ tila, kpai o̩mojo̩do̩ e̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ ku ma ma de̩ hiolo n, uwe̩ ki la tane̩ ge̩.
Oñ abo ku ma la ma tane̩ le̩, akwo ochuʼka uwe̩ ala ma tane̩, alu kʼuwe̩ adʼaja-wñ che she̩ke̩l ajifa me̩lu, alu ku she̩ke̩l uña kiafo̩ de̩ (owñ che gera ogu).

Ama o̩mojo̩do̩ okuno̩, abe̩k o̩mojo̩do̩ ala, abe̩k o̩mojo̩do̩ ewo, uwe̩ ki la tane̩ n; ama fo̩. Uwe̩ ki tʼe̩bie̩ abo e-le̩ fio̩ oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ kʼe̩ gu ula-ma jo, kʼi mad e̩wñ ku ma duwa lugbo una, kʼi kpo ru Jihofa.
Uwe̩ muda anʼe̩la-ma, alu kʼache̩do̩ ku ma miejo kpai alu kʼuta e-awo̩to̩ de̩, alu le̩ uwe̩ ane̩.

E̩wñ eko nyate̩ ef e̩wñ kiafo̩ du kʼabo Israe̩l ko nyate̩ ñwu Jihofa le̩, uwe̩ u ko ñw u, kpai amo̩ma-we̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, kpai amo̩ma-we̩ onobule̩ manyʼuwe̩, kʼi chʼuhio̩me̩ o̩gbegbele̩; alo e-omu ku ma kpe̩ o̩gba Jihofa o̩gbegbele̩ i ache ñw e̩ kpai amugbe̩-we̩ manyʼuwe̩.
Taku Jihofa ka ñw Aro̩n kakini, Uwe̩ ane̩ e̩wñ ogu du kʼe̩ je̩ oj ane̩-ma n, uwe̩ la anʼukpe̩ du efu-ma n; omi chʼukpe̩-we̩ kpai e̩wñ ogu kʼe̩ je̩ ef abo Israe̩l.
I la chʼe-abo Lifai, go, u mʼukpe̩gwa e̩wñ du oj ane̩ Israe̩l ko chʼe̩wñ ogu-ma ku ma je̩ koji uko̩lo̩-ma ku ma che, owñ chʼuko̩lo̩ unyabo ujeju le̩.
Ate̩to̩gba-i abo Israe̩l ki la te̩me̩ru unyabo ujeju n, tode̩gba ku ma nʼadu adure ku ma ku.
Abo Lifai ache uko̩lo̩ unyabo ujeju, ama la anʼudu e-ma; e-le̩ chʼuhio̩me̩ o̩gbegbele̩ gbogbo nyʼo̩hio̩gu-me̩; ma la ane̩ e̩wñ ogu du ku ma aje̩ ef abo Israe̩l in.
Todu u mʼukpe̩gwa e̩wñ abo Israe̩l, e-ku ma kowa che e̩wñ ekonyate̩ ñwu Jihofa ko ñw abo Lifai ki chʼe̩wñ ogu ku ma je̩; todule̩ oñ u ka ñwu ma ka kʼama ane̩ e̩wñ ogu du ef abo Israe̩l in.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,

Anubile̩ ge̩, uwe̩ aka ñw abo Lifai kakini, E̩gba ku me̩ mʼukpe̩gwa e̩wñ gba kwʼo̩wo̩ abo Israe̩l, owñ chʼe-ma kʼu ko ñwu me̩ ki chʼe̩wñ ogu-me̩ le̩, tak ame̩ ako e̩wñ kwef e-le̩ nyate̩ ñwu Jihofa, owñ chʼe̩kpe̩gwa ki kwʼef e̩kpe̩gwa e̩wñ le̩.
Taku ma alʼe̩wñ-me̩ ku me̩ ko nyʼate̩ le̩ ru me̩ dabe̩ne̩ ki chʼe̩wñ e̩yo̩ ki kwo ajita ugwo̩ka, abe̩k i la dabe̩ne̩ kʼi kwʼef aguo̩kolo̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma.

Abe̩le̩ oñ ame̩ ñʼako e̩wñ edu nyate̩ wa ñwu Jihofa kwef e̩wñ e̩kpe̩gwa e-me̩ chaka, owñ chʼe-ku me̩ agba kwʼo̩wo̩ abo Israe̩l; taku kwef e-le̩ ame̩ ako e̩wñ ku me̩ ko nyate̩ ñwu Jihofa ñw Aro̩n atama.
Kwef e̩wñ du ku ma ko ñwu me̩ chaka, ame̩ ako e̩wñ nyate̩ ñwu Jihofa alu ki chʼukpe̩-wñ, owñ chʼe-ki nʼo̩ro̩ chaka, owñ chʼe-ki afo̩ ki dʼefu-wñ.

Todule̩ uwe̩ aka ñwu ma kakini, E̩gba ku me̩ kʼo̩ro̩ ki dʼefu-wñ nyate̩, ma ki lʼe-ki bo̩ rʼabo Lifai dabe̩ne̩ ki chʼe̩wñ e̩yo̩ ki kwʼajita ugwo̩ka-ma, kpai omi-wñ kʼi akwʼef aguo̩ko̩lo̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma.
Ame̩ la aje̩ ugbo du ku me̩ jo̩, ame̩ kpai abunyi-me̩, todu e-le̩ chʼuro̩me̩ e-me̩ koji uko̩lo̩ ku me̩ che ef unyabo ujeju.
Ame̩ anʼadu adure du ugbo-wñ n, owñ chʼabu ku me̩ kʼo̩ro̩-wñ nyate̩ le̩. Ame̩ ki la je̩ kʼe̩wñ kiafo̩ e-abo Israe̩l chʼe̩wñ o̩ja n, kʼame̩ ki we eku.
